"}, {"question": "How Do You Calculate The Gross Enrolment Ratio (GER)? ", "answer": "The gross enrollment ratio for primary school is calculated by dividing the number of students enrolled in primary education regardless of age by the population of the age group which officially corresponds to primary education and multiplying by 100.
